title: travelplanner: Can you plan a 5-day travel itinerary from Boston to New York for two people, visiting 2 different cities between March 7th and March 11th, 2022? Our budget is now set at $2,700 for this trip. Please note that we require accommodations that allow parties, and we would like rooms that are not shared. Lastly, for our travel, we'd prefer not to fly. (567e1f6ae54b8663)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

chat_history.content: Can you plan a 5-day travel itinerary from Boston to New York for two people, visiting 2 different cities between March 7th and March 11th, 2022? Our budget is now set at $2,700 for this trip. Please note that we require accommodations that allow parties, and we would like rooms that are not shared. Lastly, for our travel, we'd prefer not to fly.

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions":"Plan a 5-day travel itinerary from Boston to New York for two people, visiting 2 different cities between March 7th and March 11th, 2022. The budget is $2,700. Accommodations should allow parties and should not be shared. Travel should not include flying."}

chat_history.content:
### 5-Day Travel Itinerary from Boston to New York

#### Day 1: March 7th, 2022
- **Departure from Boston to Albany**
  - **Mode of Transportation:** Self-driving
  - **Estimated Distance:** 170 miles
  - **Estimated Travel Time:** 3 hours

- **Accommodation in Albany:**
  - **Name:** Mid Town East Side Apartment
  - **Type:** Entire home/apt
  - **Price:** $737 per night
  - **House Rules:** No pets & No children under 10
  - **Maximum Occupancy:** 6

#### Day 2: March 8th, 2022
- **Explore Albany:**
  - Visit the New York State Capitol
  - Explore the Albany Institute of History & Art
  - Walk around Washington Park

- **Accommodation in Albany:**
  - **Name:** Mid Town East Side Apartment
  - **Type:** Entire home/apt
  - **Price:** $737 per night
  - **House Rules:** No pets & No children under 10
  - **Maximum Occupancy:** 6

#### Day 3: March 9th, 2022
- **Departure from Albany to Rochester**
  - **Mode of Transportation:** Self-driving
  - **Estimated Distance:** 226 miles
  - **Estimated Travel Time:** 4 hours

- **Accommodation in Rochester:**
  - **Name:** Romantic 1 bedroom Part2 Harlem USA
  - **Type:** Entire home/apt
  - **Price:** $70 per night
  - **House Rules:** No visitors & No children under 10
  - **Maximum Occupancy:** 3

#### Day 4: March 10th, 2022
- **Explore Rochester:**
  - Visit the George Eastman Museum
  - Explore the Seneca Park Zoo
  - Walk around Highland Park

- **Accommodation in Rochester:**
  - **Name:** Romantic 1 bedroom Part2 Harlem USA
  - **Type:** Entire home/apt
  - **Price:** $70 per night
  - **House Rules:** No visitors & No children under 10
  - **Maximum Occupancy:** 3

#### Day 5: March 11th, 2022
- **Departure from Rochester to New York City**
  - **Mode of Transportation:** Self-driving
  - **Estimated Distance:** 333 miles
  - **Estimated Travel Time:** 6 hours

- **Accommodation in New York City:**
  - **Name:** Cool Downtown Apartment in Great Location
  - **Type:** Entire home/apt
  - **Price:** $997 per night
  - **House Rules:** No pets
  - **Maximum Occupancy:** 7

### Budget Breakdown
- **Accommodation Costs:**
  - Albany: 2 nights x $737 = $1,474
  - Rochester: 2 nights x $70 = $140
  - New York City: 1 night x $997 = $997
  - **Total Accommodation Cost:** $2,611

- **Remaining Budget for Food, Activities, and Miscellaneous:** $89

### Notes
- Ensure to book accommodations in advance to secure availability.
- Plan meals and activities within the remaining budget.
- Consider additional costs for fuel and parking during the trip.

Enjoy your trip!

chat_history.content:
Your 5-day travel itinerary from Boston to New York has been successfully planned and saved. Here is a summary of your trip:

### Day 1: March 7th, 2022
- **Travel:** Self-driving from Boston to Albany (170 miles, 3 hours)
- **Accommodation:** Mid Town East Side Apartment, Albany

### Day 2: March 8th, 2022
- **City:** Albany
- **Attractions:** New York State Capitol, Albany; Albany Institute of History & Art, Albany; Washington Park, Albany
- **Accommodation:** Mid Town East Side Apartment, Albany

### Day 3: March 9th, 2022
- **Travel:** Self-driving from Albany to Rochester (226 miles, 4 hours)
- **Accommodation:** Romantic 1 bedroom Part2 Harlem USA, Rochester

### Day 4: March 10th, 2022

- **Attractions:** George Eastman Museum, Rochester; Seneca Park Zoo, Rochester; Highland Park, Rochester
- **Accommodation:** Romantic 1 bedroom Part2 Harlem USA, Rochester

### Day 5: March 11th, 2022

Enjoy your trip!

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").
current_city.title: Current City

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"
transportation.title: Transportation

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"
breakfast.title: Breakfast

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"
attraction.title: Attraction

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
accommodation.title: Accommodation

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City
